Name: Hooker Furniture Living Room Sanctuary Proper Sofa
Description:
In a flawless, sophisticated contemporary silhouette, the Sanctuary Proper Sofa will become a beloved addition to your home. The striking style is punctuated with classic X motifs over the fabric on the sides and all the way across the back. The exposed wood frame and legs are finished in Quartz Grey, a light wood tone with areas of cool gray burnishing creating a subtle two-tone effect. With a loose pillow back, the Prim is upholstered in Encore Pearl, a performance fabric to resist stains and spills. The two accent pillows are in Sequins Pearl, another performance fabric. Channeling jet setting socialites from the golden age of Hollywood as its muse, Hooker Furniture is set to launches a major expansion to its popular Sanctuary collection. The bedroom, dining room, occasional and home office pieces are grouped into three unique new personas, each of which embody the influences of the iconic starlets whom left impressions of glamour, charm and class on American pop culture. From bold and dramatic to soft and romantic to a statement-making eclectic lifestyle, the three personas ñ Collette, Anastasie and Diamant ñ effortlessly bring to life a well-traveled socialite who has curated a collection of home furnishings in her metropolitan home that tell the story of her travels across the globe. Anastasie offers a softer, romantic look with its creamy white finish that is accented with champagne and silver tipping. Several historical reproduction styled pieces in a two-tone finish are intermingled throughout, giving the group a bit of a traditional European cottage style. Additional design details include table tops with intricate quatrefoil veneer patterns crafted with oak and a mix of unique walnut inlay, carved chairs with acanthus leaf and scrollwork detailing and champagne tipped eglomise.
